/** CHANGELOG **/

Theme Version: 1.1.0
Release Date: November 5, 2021

Theme Version: 1.1.2
Release Date: November 10, 2021

- Hotfix for no display of REMAINING TIME and EXPIRATION TIME - Issue opened by Lynx701 (https://github.com/smrtrnx/JuanFiTemplate/issues/2)
- Moved bundle.min.js below closing column section </div><!--COLUMN-->	
- Modified files and added instruction comments for the development mode on files.
    * login.html
    * alogin.html
    * logout.html
    * status.html
    * src/js/core.js
    * scss/modules/bootstrap-icons/_bootstrap-icons.scss
    * style.css

Theme Version: 1.1.3
Release Date: November 11, 2021
- Modified <meta name="viewport">
    * login.html
    * status.html
    * alogin.html
    * error.html
